You will want to set the path to the folder where the data is. As in:

```{r}
setwd("~/Code/r_programming/assignment_1/")
```

```{r}
source("pollutantmean.R")
pollutantmean("specdata", "sulfate", 1:10)
## [1] 4.064
pollutantmean("specdata", "nitrate", 70:72)
## [1] 1.706
pollutantmean("specdata", "nitrate", 23)
## [1] 1.281
```
